siteDescription: MSRBot.io is a live, automated (and hand curated) Media Standards Registry (MSR) of media technology documents — extracting, validating, and linking documents across SMPTE, ISO, ITU, AES and many other publishers, SDOs, and industry groups.
author: Steve LLamb
copyright: © Steve LLamb https://github.com/SteveLLamb and PrZ3 https://github.com/PrZ3r, All rights reserved.
penguin404Messages: 404 — Look at yourself, you’ve disappointed Parsey.
404 — Parsey has looked everywhere. No dice. No ice.
404 — The archive is cold and empty. Parsey has the sads.
404 — Parsey has flapped into the void and found nothing.
404 — Parsey has waddled off to file a missing-page report.
